items.sentence: It took Tom three weeks to sell all the necklaces that he'd made over the winter.
Tom settled into his new job quickly and soon became a valued member of the team.
My main concern is that we'll run out of money before we can finish this project.
Tom said he wondered whether Mary and I'd really be able to do that by ourselves.
I've got five different dictionaries on the shelf, but I always use the same one.
